title: How to Get Twitch Drops in Baldur's Gate 3: Complete Guide

steps.title: Link your Larian and Twitch accounts.
steps.content: Link your Larian and Twitch accounts. To get the rewards from Twitch, you'll need to link these accounts together. Do the following: Go to https://larian.com/account in a web browser. Enter your email address and password to log in. Select Connected Accounts . Select Twitch . Follow the on-screen prompts to log into Twitch. Select Authorize .

steps.title: Go to https://www.twitch.tv/ or open the Twitch app.
steps.content: Go to https://www.twitch.tv/ or open the Twitch app. Drops can only be obtained on your PC/Mac in a web browser or the Twitch app for Android and iOS. This feature is currently unsupported on consoles, Smart TVs, and other streaming devices. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Navigate to an eligible stream.
steps.content: Navigate to an eligible stream. Use the Browse tab on the homepage to find active channels for Baldur's Gate 3. This channel must have Drops enabled to count toward your reward progress. You'll usually see the DropsEnabled tag in the stream's description.

steps.title: Watch the stream.
steps.content: Watch the stream. You'll need to watch at least 2 hours to earn rewards. You can only earn progress toward a Drop with one participating channel at a time. Watching another channel in a separate tab won't build your progress more quickly; Twitch only counts the stream you're actively watching .

steps.title: Claim the rewards.
steps.content: Claim the rewards. Select your profile picture and select Drops & Rewards to check your progress. When you've completed a drop, you can click Claim Now . Otherwise, you'll see the percentage currently completed. The next time you log into Baldur's Gate 3, you'll find the rewards in the Traveller's Chest.

steps.title: Relog into your account.
steps.content: Relog into your account. If you're not seeing the rewards in the game, log out of your Larian account and log back in again.

steps.title: Empty the Traveller's Chest.
steps.content: Empty the Traveller's Chest. Make sure there are no existing items in the chest. Then, save the game and restart the client.

steps.title: Make sure the proper accounts are connected.
steps.content: Make sure the proper accounts are connected. Verify that your Larian and Twitch account information are correct and linked.

steps.title: Wait 24 hours.
steps.content: Wait 24 hours. The rewards may need some time to be sent to your account. Try again the next day.

steps.title: Twitch Drops are in-game rewards earned by watching streams.
steps.content: Twitch Drops are in-game rewards earned by watching streams. The streams must have the participating DropsEnabled tag to count towards your progress. You'll gain progress towards a reward by actively watching the channel and be notified when you meet the watch quota. Your Twitch account must be linked to the proper game developer to receive the in-game drops. To get Baldur's Gate 3 Twitch Drops, you'll need to link your Larian account.
